instructions: Open Facebook on your phone. If you don't have the Facebook app installed on your phone you can also navigate to Facebook.com using Chrome or your default browser. Tap the What's on your mind text field to open a new post. Tap Check In. The Check In option has a red location marker icon next to it. Type in the name of your location . Tap to select your location from the drop-down list. Tap friends' names to tag them in your Check-In if desired. You can also skip this step if you don't want to tag anyone. Tap Done . If you're finished composing your post, tap Share to post your check-in.
